CommitComments.CommitComment: UPDATING: no problems resolved since last commit.
Added decorate call when a brick is hit.
Put some ResizerBricks into the game.
Completed shared variables and shared objects section of the lab.
Finished attaching the GUIController to SystemController.
Added shutdown method and polite shutdown. Also made the server exit after 10 seconds of the shutdown being initiated even if threads were still running.
